name: Boardwalk Trail
author: jaervin
description: Scenic walk through one of the most unique biospheres in the state.

reviews.author: AwesomeCarnival18
reviews.comment: Great place! brought my family and they loved it. Such a close but beautiful spot

name: Table Rock Trail
author: hikeguru
description: A challenging trail leading to breathtaking panoramic views from Table Rock Mountain. The steep ascent is rewarded with one of the best overlooks in South Carolina.

reviews.author: NatureNerd45
reviews.review: Tough but rewarding! The view from the top is absolutely stunning.

reviews.author: MountainGoatHiker
reviews.review: Steep and challenging, but worth the effort. Bring plenty of water!

reviews.author: SCExplorer
reviews.review: One of the best hikes in the state. Amazing views!

name: Raven Cliff Falls Trail
author: waterfallfan
description: A scenic hike leading to an overlook of the tallest waterfall in South Carolina. A great balance between effort and reward.

reviews.author: HikingLover92
reviews.review: Absolutely beautiful! The waterfall is stunning, especially after rain.

reviews.author: WeekendExplorer
reviews.review: Nice hike, but the overlook can get crowded.

reviews.author: TrailSeeker
reviews.review: Loved the trail, though I wish you could get closer to the falls.
